projects.title: Instagram Clone
description: This application is built using Flutter ,a cross-platform mobile development framework.
It uses Google and Facebook authentication to allow users to sign in, and Riverpod for state management.
The database is Cloud Firestore, a NoSQL database that is scalable and reliable.Users can post images or videos, and other users can comment and like or dislike the posts.
Users can also delete posts that they have posted.This application is a great way to share your thoughts and experiences with others, and to connect with people who share your interests.

projects.title: Movie Application
description: This application is built using Flutter, a cross-platform mobile development framework.
It uses the Movie Database API to get data about movies, and Riverpod for state management.
Flutter Hooks are also implemented, which allows for more concise and expressive code.
Dynamic themes are available, so users can change the look and feel of the application to match their preferences.
Filter options are available, so users can narrow down the results to find the movies that they are interested in.
